phrases: I cannot hold a candle to Cancer, but I am pretty good if I do say so myself!
And it feels great doing this outdoors, does not it?
It actually feels kind of peaceful.
Although with this guild, you know the peace is not going to last long...
This peace did not last long at all...
Do not give me just Natsu!
At any rate, dream or not, all those fish were there for the taking...
You are my partner, are not you?!
And right now, I am cleaning the backyard.
If it is my turn, why is not my partner helpin' me?!
It does not make sense, right?!
After all, it is not my turn today.
Happy, when did you turn so cold?!
Look, it is a beautiful day, is not it?
Why are you two arguing over nonsense?
At least clean up without bitching about it!
I never said I had a beef with cleaning!
Is not it a beautiful day, Carla?
Listen when a guy's talkin' to you!
Even after seven years, you have not changed a bit, Natsu.
That is what I tell him, just about every day!
Well, I feel as young as ever, anyway...
Just because you feel young, does that make you young?
And if we are talking ability, it is improved by leaps and bounds.
That is what I like to hear!
This is a perfect way to kill time after lunch.
And So, We Aim for the Top!
It is not like we were not doing anything for seven years.
I trained in my own way.
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
This is not seven years ago!
Then maybe we have a chance against Natsu, too?!
I am not as powerful as I was then...
Since when can you do that?
If that had hit me, I would be toast!
That must have burned through a lot of his power.
Natsu, I think you better not use that one in a real battle.
But you were great, too, Max-san!
I do not need to be flattered, Wendy.
But if you are that powerful,
Ogre should not have been able to walk all over you.
It was not a problem we could solve through force, you know?
Although that is exactly what Master and the others did...
Still, the problem is more serious than I thought.
Gildarts and Laxus were monsters to begin with, but them aside,
our power has not caught up to this time period.
Even Natsu was given a run for his money by Max there...
What you said before really was just flattery...?
I wonder if there is a way to boost our magic power all at once...
Do not you have some kind of good medicine for us?
Like one that will suddenly increase our power a hundredfold...
I suppose that would be too convenient...
What is it, her turn to clean?!
What is with that old lady?!
She used to be Gramps' girlfriend!
I am going to introduce the next master to you now.
I am not mentally prepared yet...
It are not going to be you!
Master, as well as everyone in the guild,
I am sorry, but I am not cut out to be a master.
I will take the opportunity to give two orders as the fifth master.
The first: accept Laxus as a member of Fairy Tail.
Now the Raijinshuu is complete again!
If that is what the fifth master rules, we have no choice but to obey.
The second: I appoint Mr. Makarov Dreyar the sixth Fairy Tail master.
After all is said and done, we are back to normal...
That old man is incredibly strong.
I am going to travel for a while.
But I will come back when I am in the mood.
I apologize for going off again without warning.
But anytime you want to meet me, just make the wish on that card.
It will get through to the card I have and I will rush right over to you.
I already told you things were fine the way they were between us, old man!
I pray that by then, Fairy Tail will once again be Fiore's number one guild.
But that is not my duty.
Master, that is your last job.
To make Fairy Tail Fiore's number one guild again!
Since it is come to this, I am not going to let anyone else be master!
I will be Master'til the day I die!
Boy, he is being a grump...
As always, you say that at any old time...
I swear that I will not tell anyone about what you showed me in the basement.
Who is the one that suggested going to see Poluchka-san?!
That woman's a force of nature.
I heard she was a misanthrope, but I did not realize it was that bad...
That old lady made Wendy cry!
I am sure this was my first time... but it gave me such a familiar feeling...
They are the same as Grandine!
Fiore's number one guild, he says...
That is being way too optimistic!
It is good to be ambitious.
Yeah, if this were seven years ago...
they are powerful guilds that cannot even be compared to what they were seven years ago.
Standing next to them, even with our main members back...
The Tenrou group is not any stronger than they were seven years ago.
There is no way to make up for the seven-year gap.
Whether we are talkin' individual magic power or the guild's overall strength,
becomin' Fiore's number one guild is impossible!
It sounds like it will take some time before we can get back to the way we were then.
I have already waited seven years!
I do not want to take any more time, Erza-nee!
There is just one way to become number one in a hurry!
I already decided we would not be participating in that!
What do you mean by that, Number Four?
Would you not call me that, Number Six?
The same voice as the dragon Wendy is looking for?
They are the same as my mother, the Sky Dragon, Grandine...
This needs to be checked out!
Even if Grandine really has turned into a human,
this would not make any sense.
Your dragons disappeared seven years ago...
Poluchka-san has known Master for a lot longer than that.
In other words, when the dragons were around, Poluchka-san was around.
They cannot be one and the same.
Reincarnation, transformation, does not look like there is much to go on there, huh?
True, now that I have calmed down and thought about it, you are right.
Even if the voice and scent are the same, the tone and mood are completely different.
I cannot even imagine a kind dragon.
I am not Grandine, the one you are looking for.
I am human, through and through.
But do not you hate people...?
You got a problem with one human hating other humans?!
I am sorry, but I do not know where your dragon is.
I have no direct relationship with dragons.
There is another world, different from this one.
You know about Edolas, do not you?
I have heard that you have even met your Edolas counterparts.
I would be considered the Grandine of Edolas.
Decades ago, I got lost and ended up on this world.
Makarov helped me in my time of need.
And I grew rather fond of Earthland,
so even though I had several opportunities to return to Edolas,
Are Igneel and Metalicana humans over there, too?!
But I have talked to the Sky Dragon.
She spoke to me telepathically, I suppose through magic means.
She said you people wanted to become strong.
But it may be possible only for the girl named Wendy.
I wrote down this magic book exactly as the Sky Dragon dictated.
There are two types of Sky Magic,
Milky Way and Light Burst: Sky Drill,
two secret Dragon Slayer spells that the Sky Dragon failed to teach you.
She wanted me to give that to you if you came by.
Be careful you do not overdo it and damage your health.
We are going to be in it!
We are never going to take part in that again!
You do not have the right to decide that anymore, Dad!
I am speaking as a member of the guild!
What is all the fuss about?
Just looks like an argument between father and son to me...
Who does not want to participate?!
That is the one thing I do not want to do again.
It will just expose us to ridicule...
But now we have got the Tenrou group!
We have got Natsu-nii and Erza-nee!
But the Tenrou group's got a seven-year blank!
You are fine just the way you are, Levy!
What is this about bein' in it or not?
Natsu-nii, while you guys were gone, a festival started up to decide the number one guild in Fiore.
All the guilds in Fiore gather and compete with each other with their magic!
It is called the Grand Magic Games!
Right now, the number one guild in Fiore is said to be Sabertooth, right?
If we beat Sabertooth and win the games,
we will become Fiore's number one guild!
I do not know if you guys are strong enough to pull that off right now...
If we win, the guild gets 30 million jewel as a reward!
Sabertooth is not our only enemy!
Incidentally, in past festivals, we were always in last place.
Do not be proud of that!
We will take that crummy record and destroy it!
By then, we will be lean and mean,
and Fairy Tail will become Fiore's number one guild again!
If everyone joins their power as one...
That is how long I have to learn the magic I got from Grandine!
Is not that what this guild is like all year'round?
When it comes to festivals, Man!
It looks like we will be able to achieve Gildarts' wish earlier than expected, huh?
Are we really going to participate?
Sure, why not give it a shot?
I-I really do not think we should go through with it...
It is a little different than the battle festival you are thinking of, Natsu...
I have already decided we are going to do it, so there is no point in complaining!
Let us aim for the 30 million... ahem, I mean, aim for Fiore's number one!
Team Fairy Tail is going to enter the Grand Magic Games!
Do not say that like it is nothing!
We have come to the Celestial Spirit world!
It is been a long time since we have met the cow, the shrimp, and the girl with the horns!
And there are lots of Celestial Spirits we have never seen before!
Next time: Song of the Stars!
A strange Plue is clinging to me and I cannot get away...
